abstract: Facebook has almost finished raising $150 million in capital, money the social network hopes to use to buy out shares of hundreds of current employees, VentureBeat reported, citing undisclosed sources.
snippet: Facebook has almost finished raising $150 million in capital, money the social network hopes to use to buy out shares of hundreds of current employees, VentureBeat reported, citing undisclosed sources.
lead_paragraph: Facebook has almost finished raising $150 million in capital, in a move by the social network to buy out shares of hundreds of current employees, VentureBeat reported.

headline.main: Facebook Raises Funds for Workers’ Stock, Report Says
